column3: mbrɛ odua ye na ɔyɛ fɛw Ma enuanom dɛ wɔbɔbɔ mu atsena koryɛ mu!"

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ aboɔdzen ngo a Wohuei guu Aaron n’apampamu
column3: Osianee guu n’abɔdwesa mu; Na ɔsɔnee boguu n’atar no mbuano no do;"

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ Hermon ɔbɔsu a Osian bogu Zion mbepɔw do: Na hɔ na EWURADZE hyɛɛ nhyira no
